p: Changes in plant community composition in our plots show a transformation towards a more thermophilic vegetation in both decades (Fig. 4a), in congruence with Gottfried et al. ( 2012). Most noteworthy, the thermophilisation signal, already significant in the first decade of observation 1994–2004 (Table S17), was significantly stronger during the second decade 2004–2014 (Table S18).
